channel.title: [PI] [317] Adding Buy Functions
channel.description: On my server there is only "buy 1" "buy 5" and "buy 10" i want buy 50 buy 100 and buy x i cant figure out where to change that at. I think its somewhere in rsinterface.java and shopassistant.java?

item.title: [PI] [317] Adding Buy Functions
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

It would be in RSinterface.java client sided just look for something called

if(rsInterface.itemActions[l3].length() == 0) rsInterface.itemActions[l3] = null;

Read full topic
